member.name: IWICBitmapFrameDecode.GetColorContexts
member.summary: Retrieves the associated with the image frame.

param.name: cCount
param.para: The number of color contexts to retrieve.
This value must be the size of, or smaller than, the size available to ppIColorContexts.

member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the objects.
A pointer that receives the number of color contexts contained in the image frame.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameDecode.GetMetadataQueryReader
member.summary: Retrieves a metadata query reader for the frame.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the frame's metadata query reader.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameDecode.GetThumbnail
member.summary: Retrieves a small preview of the frame, if supported by the codec.
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the of the thumbnail.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameDecode
member.summary: Defines methods for decoding individual image frames of an encoded file.
